Trade/Device Name(s): directCHECK® Whole Blood Control for HEMOCHRON® ACT+ assay
directCHECK ℬ Whole Blood Control for HEMOCHRON® ACT-LR assay
directCHECK® for Hemochron Jr. Microcoagulation Systems ACT+ test cuvette
directCHECK ℬ for Hemochron Jr. Microcoagulation Systems ACTLR test cuvette
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation
Specimen Container(s): Glass ampoule with liquid diluent assembly
Method(s)/Technology(ies): In vitro diagnostic coagulation quality control
Methodologies: Assayed lyophilized whole blood control material
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for directCHECK Whole Blood Controls for use as quality control in HEMOCHRON ACT+ and ACT-LR coagulation assays on HEMOCHRON Jr. Signature+ and Signature Elite instruments
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed lyophilized whole blood controls intended for quality control of quantitative coagulation tests: HEMOCHRON ACT+ or ACT-LR assays on HEMOCHRON Jr. Signature+ and Signature Elite instruments.
